definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜溃疡最常发生于长期使用软性角膜接触镜的病人。

sentences.english: Corneal ulcers occur most often in patients who use extended-wear soft contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 角膜溃疡最常发生于长期使用软性角膜接触镜的病人。

sentences.english: Objective To examine the usefulness of keratoplasty with the patients of symblepharon after burns.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察角膜移植治疗烧伤后睑球粘连的效果。

sentences.english: Topical administration of antifungal agents is main method in the treatment of fungal keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 药物治疗真菌性角膜炎的主要方法是滴用抗真菌眼剂。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of deep lamellar keratoplasty for corneal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨深板层角膜移植术治疗角膜溃疡的临床效果。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical effect of deep lamellar keratoplasty for corneal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨深板层角膜移植术治疗角膜溃疡的临床效果。

sentences.english: Evaluate the usage of radical scavengers in alkali burns of cornea.
sentences.chinese: 探讨角膜碱烧伤后自由基清除剂治疗机制。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss the clinical effects of the lamellar keratoplasty for the treatment of ocular bomb injury.
sentences.chinese: 探讨板层角膜移植治疗眼球爆炸伤的临床效果。

sentences.english: The laser removes tissue from the cornea very accurately without damaging nearby tissues.
sentences.chinese: 激光可以非常精确地切削角膜组织且不损伤邻近组织。

sentences.english: At different time of preservation, the same check items and staining of alizarin red were made.
sentences.chinese: 保存后不同时间取出角膜观察相同内容和茜素红染色。

sentences.english: Corneal epithelial injury is one of the most common keratopathy in external ophthalmopathy.
sentences.chinese: 角膜上皮损伤疾病是眼科门诊最常见的角膜病变之一。

sentences.english: Corneal epithelial injury is one of the most common keratopathy in external ophthalmopathy.
sentences.chinese: 角膜上皮损伤疾病是眼科门诊最常见的角膜病变之一。

sentences.english: Health professionals also employ a fluorescein stain to detect ulcers of the cornea.
sentences.chinese: 卫生专业人员还采用了荧光染色检测的角膜溃疡。

sentences.english: Aim To observe the therapeutic efficacy of Matrine on viral keratitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察苦参碱对病毒性角膜炎的治疗效果。

sentences.english: To discuss the effective treatment measures of corneal neovascularization.
sentences.chinese: 探讨角膜新生血管的有效治疗措施。

sentences.english: The treatment for a corneal ulcer is antibiotic drops applied frequently to the eye.
sentences.chinese: 角膜溃疡的治疗主要为频繁使用抗生素滴眼液。

definition: ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
